mapper.select: select board_seq, title, content, viewcount, b.category_seq category ,b.img img, b.insert_date insert_date, u.user_seq user_seq, u.nickname nickname from board b JOIN user u ON b.user_seq = u.user_seq order BY board_seq desc LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}

select board_seq, title, content, viewcount, b.category_seq category ,b.img img, b.insert_date insert_date, u.user_seq user_seq, u.nickname nickname from board b JOIN user u ON b.user_seq = u.user_seq where board_seq = #{boardSeq}
mapper.insert: insert into board(title, content, insert_date, img, user_seq, category_seq) values(#{title}, #{content}, now(), #{img}, #{userSeq}, #{categorySeq})
